## StorageDownloader class

Default downloader used - handles downloading from all schemes specified in the gateway URLs configuration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class StorageDownloader implements IStorageDownloader
```

**Implements:** [IStorageDownloader](./storage.istoragedownloader.md)

## Example

```jsx
// Can instantiate the downloader with the default gateway URLs
const downloader = new StorageDownloader();
const storage = new Web3sdksStorage({ downloader });
```

## Methods

| Method                                                                          | Modifiers | Description |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| [download(uri, gatewayUrls, attempts)](./storage.storagedownloader.download.md) |           |             |
